resources.string:
This Tasker plugin allows you to automate the act of launching commands on remote routers registered in DD-WRT Companion application.
You can perform actions from a set of predefined commands, or optionally provide your own commands.

To use the plugin, you must have both DD-WRT Companion (Premium flavor, at least version '%1$s') and Tasker applications installed.
Then open Tasker and DD-WRT Companion will appear as an Action Plugin.
\nThe History panel below lists all actions sent out to routers for execution via this plugin.
